treatments_requested.name: Methotrexate
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: Requested for treatment of lupus anti-coagulant-type syndrome

treatments_tried_and_worked.name: Methotrexate
treatments_tried_and_worked.other_or_notes: Achieved good results but not tolerated

guidelines_details: Methotrexate is appropriate for undifferentiated connective tissue disease per relevant literature.
soc_details: Injectable methotrexate is clinically appropriate and indicated for this patient.

study_details.key_findings: Methotrexate is appropriate for undifferentiated connective tissue disease.

rationale: Injectable methotrexate is clinically appropriate and indicated for this patient due to intolerance to oral form and good results achieved with methotrexate.
